languages.text: {n}Ульфар печально качает головой.{/n} "Нет больше стаи. Я мог бы стать Одиноким волком, мстителем, но сердце мое желает иного. Я соскучился по обществу воинов Фенриса. Когда мы исполним твое дело здесь, я отыщу Торбальда Железношкурого и приму его щедрое предложение, свяжу себя узами кровного братства с Грозовыми укусами. Долг мой перед Всеотцом еще не исполнен".

{n}Ulfar sadly shakes his head.{/n} "The pack is no more. I could become a Lone Wolf, an avenger of the fallen, but my heart yearns for something else. I have missed the company of the warriors of Fenris. When we finish your business here, I will seek out Thorbald Ironhide and accept his generous offer — I will bind myself by ties of blood brotherhood to the Stormbiters. My duty to the Allfather is not yet fulfilled."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар печально качает головой.{/n} "Нет больше стаи. Я мог бы стать Одиноким волком, мстителем, но сердце мое желает иного. Я соскучился по обществу воинов Фенриса. languages.text: {n}Ulfar menea tristemente la cabeza.{/n} «Ya no hay jauría. Podría convertirme en Lobo Solitario, vengador de los caídos, pero mi corazón anhela otra cosa. He echado de menos la compañía de los guerreros de Fenris. Cuando termine sus asuntos aquí, buscaré a Thorbald Piel de Hierro y aceptaré su generosa oferta: me convertiré en hermano de sangre de los Muerdetormentas. Aún no he cumplido mi deber hacia el Padre de todas las cosas».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sadly shakes his head.{/n} "The pack is no more. I could become a Lone Wolf, an avenger of the fallen, but my heart yearns for something else. I have missed the company of the warriors of Fenris. When we finish your business here, I will seek out Thorbald Ironhide and accept his generous offer — I will bind myself by ties of blood brotherhood to the Stormbiters. My duty to the Allfather is not yet fulfilled."

He echado de menos la compañía de los guerreros de Fenris. Aún no he cumplido mi deber hacia el Padre de todas las cosas».

languages.text: {n}乌尔法哀伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“狼群已不复存在。我可以成为孤狼，为那些逝去的人复仇，但我心里却渴望着别的东西，我怀念芬里斯战士的陪伴。等这里的任务结束之后，我会去找索巴德·铁皮，接受他慷慨的邀请。我打算加入噬风者，与新的兄弟结以血脉之情。我还没有完成全父赋予我的职责。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sadly shakes his head.{/n} "The pack is no more. I could become a Lone Wolf, an avenger of the fallen, but my heart yearns for something else. I have missed the company of the warriors of Fenris. When we finish your business here, I will seek out Thorbald Ironhide and accept his generous offer — I will bind myself by ties of blood brotherhood to the Stormbiters. My duty to the Allfather is not yet fulfilled."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法哀伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“狼群已不复存在。我可以成为孤狼，为那些逝去的人复仇，但我心里却渴望着别的东西，我怀念芬里斯战士的陪伴。等这里的任务结束之后，我会去找索巴德·铁皮，接受他慷慨的邀请。我打算加入噬风者，与新的兄弟结以血脉之情。我还没有完成全父赋予我的职责。”

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは悲し気に頭を振る。{/n}「群れは、もうない。俺は一匹狼になって堕ちたる者の復讐を果たすこともできるが、俺の心は別のものを求めている。フェンリスの戦士仲間たちに会いたい。ここでの任務が終わったら、トールバルト・アイアンハイドを見つけて、あいつの寛大な誘いを受け入れるよ。嵐喰いとの血の兄弟の契りを結ぶんだ。全知の父への俺の義務をまだ果たしていないからな」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sadly shakes his head.{/n} "The pack is no more. I could become a Lone Wolf, an avenger of the fallen, but my heart yearns for something else. I have missed the company of the warriors of Fenris. When we finish your business here, I will seek out Thorbald Ironhide and accept his generous offer — I will bind myself by ties of blood brotherhood to the Stormbiters. My duty to the Allfather is not yet fulfilled."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは悲し気に頭を振る。{/n}「群れは、もうない。俺は一匹狼になって堕ちたる者の復讐を果たすこともできるが、俺の心は別のものを求めている。フェンリスの戦士仲間たちに会いたい。ここでの任務が終わったら、トールバルト・アイアンハイドを見つけて、あいつの寛大な誘いを受け入れるよ。嵐喰いとの血の兄弟の契りを結ぶんだ。全知の父への俺の義務をまだ果たしていないからな」

languages.text: {n}Ulfar secoue la tête d'un air triste.{/n} « La meute n'est plus. Je pourrais devenir un loup solitaire et venger mes défunts frères, mais mon cœur aspire à autre chose. La compagnie des guerriers de Fenris me manque. Quand nous en aurons terminé ici, j'irai trouver Thorbald Peau-de-Fer, j'accepterai son offre généreuse et je me lierai par le sang à la confrérie des Crocs de la tempête. Mon devoir envers le Père de Tous n'est pas encore accompli. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sadly shakes his head.{/n} "The pack is no more. I could become a Lone Wolf, an avenger of the fallen, but my heart yearns for something else. I have missed the company of the warriors of Fenris. When we finish your business here, I will seek out Thorbald Ironhide and accept his generous offer — I will bind myself by ties of blood brotherhood to the Stormbiters. My duty to the Allfather is not yet fulfilled."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar secoue la tête d'un air triste.{/n} « La meute n'est plus. Je pourrais devenir un loup solitaire et venger mes défunts frères, mais mon cœur aspire à autre chose. La compagnie des guerriers de Fenris me manque. Quand nous en aurons terminé ici, j'irai trouver Thorbald Peau-de-Fer, j'accepterai son offre généreuse et je me lierai par le sang à la confrérie des Crocs de la tempête. Mon devoir envers le Père de Tous n'est pas encore accompli. »

languages.text: {n}Ulfar schüttelt traurig den Kopf.{/n} "Das Rudel existiert nicht mehr. Ich könnte zum Einsamen Wolf werden, zum Rächer der Gefallenen, doch mein Herz sehnt sich nach etwas anderem. Ich vermisse die Gesellschaft der Krieger von Fenris. Wenn wir Eure Angelegenheiten hier beendet haben, suche ich Thorbald Eisenhaut auf und nehme sein großzügiges Angebot an — ich werde mich durch Blutsbande an die Stormbiters binden. Meine Pflicht dem Allvater gegenüber ist noch nicht erfüllt."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sadly shakes his head.{/n} "The pack is no more. I could become a Lone Wolf, an avenger of the fallen, but my heart yearns for something else. I have missed the company of the warriors of Fenris. When we finish your business here, I will seek out Thorbald Ironhide and accept his generous offer — I will bind myself by ties of blood brotherhood to the Stormbiters. My duty to the Allfather is not yet fulfilled."

Ich könnte zum Einsamen Wolf werden, zum Rächer der Gefallenen, doch mein Herz sehnt sich nach etwas anderem. Ich vermisse die Gesellschaft der Krieger von Fenris. Wenn wir Eure Angelegenheiten hier beendet haben, suche ich Thorbald Eisenhaut auf und nehme sein großzügiges Angebot an — ich werde mich durch Blutsbande an die Stormbiters binden. Meine Pflicht dem Allvater gegenüber ist noch nicht erfüllt."

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sadly shakes his head.{/n} "The pack is no more. I could become a Lone Wolf, an avenger of the fallen, but my heart yearns for something else. languages.text: {n}Ulfar üzgünce başını sallıyor.{/n} "Sürüm artık yok. Yalnız Kurt olup düşmüş kardeşlerimin intikamını alabilirim ama yüreğim, başka bir isteğe boyun eğiyor. Fenris'in savaşçılarının yanında olmayı çok özledim. Buradaki işimiz nihayete erdiğinde Thorbald Demirpost'u arayıp bulacak ve cömert teklifini kabul edeceğim. Kendimi Borayutanların kan kardeşliğine adayacağım. Yücebaba'ya olan görevim henüz tamamlanmadı."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar sadly shakes his head.{/n} "The pack is no more. I could become a Lone Wolf, an avenger of the fallen, but my heart yearns for something else. I have missed the company of the warriors of Fenris. When we finish your business here, I will seek out Thorbald Ironhide and accept his generous offer — I will bind myself by ties of blood brotherhood to the Stormbiters. My duty to the Allfather is not yet fulfilled."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar üzgünce başını sallıyor.{/n} "Sürüm artık yok. Yalnız Kurt olup düşmüş kardeşlerimin intikamını alabilirim ama yüreğimi ele geçiren başka bir istek var. Fenris'in savaşçılarının yanında olmayı çok özledim. Buradaki işimiz nihayete erdiğinde Thorbald Demirpost'u arayıp bulacağım ve cömert teklifini kabul edeceğim. Kendimi Borayutanların kan kardeşliğine adayacağım. Yücebaba'ya ait görevim henüz tamamlanmadı."
